altTitles.ja: がばい -佐賀のがばいばあちゃん-
がばい佐賀のがばいばあちゃん

altTitles.en: The Story of my Wonderful [Gabai] Grandmother

description.en: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…

altTitles.ja: 猫が如く

description.en:
The Yakuza boss is... a cat!? The "brown tiger" group boss, Oyaji. Yanagi, the new recruit in the Yakuza, and the gang members are once again at the mercy of the carefree Oyaji today... But it's not that bad.
A lively comedy about a cat... Begins!!

The title Like a Cat, or Neko ga Gotoku, is a parody of the Yakuza game series' title which is Like a Dragon or Ryu ga Gotoku.
Unexpected endings, mind-blowing stories, so-cute-you-could-die hotpot ingredients... You'll laugh everyday until you get abs!
description.zh: 反转的剧情，开脑洞的故事，超萌火锅食材花样作死，每天逗你笑出腹肌！

title.en: Nando Dakaretatte Suki ni Nanka Naranai yo.

altTitles.zh: 无论相拥多少次、我也绝不会爱上你

altTitles.zh-hk: 無論相擁多少次、我也絕不會愛上你

altTitles.en: No Matter How Many Times We Sleep Together, I Won't Fall for You

altTitles.ja: 何度抱かれたって、好きになんかならないよ。

description.en: "Your sexy voice, makes it hard to resist" I'm at the mercy of his fingers...my body shaking with sweet pleasure, all before knowing if I actually love him.
description.ja: 「いい声出すなよ、その反応たまらないな」好きとかどうとか言葉になる前に、彼の指に翻弄されて…カラダ中が甘い快感に…乱される。――OL・理緒はヤリ逃げされ、失恋したばかり。その為「Hしたら相手を好きになるか否か」の話題で大盛り上がりの同僚達を前に苦笑い。更には、その話をいけ好かないモテ同期・須賀にまで聞かれてしまい…。――「試してみようぜ？抱かれても本当に俺を好きにならないのか」いつものくだらない言い合いの末に、須賀から出たそのセリフ。否定の言葉を発する前に、理緒の艶やかな唇は激しく奪われて!?

title.en: Shuzoku [Hanshin] na Ore wa Isekai Demo Futsuu ni Kurashitai

altTitles.ja: 種族【半神】な俺は異世界でも普通に暮らしたい

altTitles.en: As a member of the [Demi-God] race, I want to live a normal life in another world

description.en: Saionji Ryoma, a young man, thought he was at home, but suddenly found himself in a strange hut. While he was confused, he suddenly received an email on his smartphone, which for some reason he had with him, from someone calling himself "the god of games and pleasure." To his surprise, in response to a wish that Reima had muttered, he was invited to another world. Not only did he have his smartphone equipped with cheat functions, but he also received the bonus of being transported as an ultra-rare species, a "demigod"! Although confused, Reima is excited that he has "come to the other world he has dreamed of," and follows the tutorial displayed on his smartphone to head to the city. However, those around him do not miss him as a "demigod" --!?
description.ja: 家にいたはずが、気づけば見知らぬ小屋にいた青年、西園寺玲真（サイオンジ リョウマ）。困惑するなか、なぜか一緒に持っていた自分のスマホに突如「遊戯と享楽を司る神」と名乗る者からメールが届く。なんと、玲真がふと呟いた願いに応え、彼を異世界に招待したというのだ。しかもスマホをチート仕様にした上に、超激レア種族【半神】となって転移するという特典付き！ 戸惑いながらも、「夢にまで見た異世界に来たんだ」と心躍らせる玲真は、スマホに表示されるチュートリアルに従って街へ向かうことに。しかし、【半神】である彼を周囲は見逃さず――!?

altTitles.ja: 一途ビッチちゃん
一途でビッチな後輩

description.en: A story about a flirty kouhai seducing her senpai.
description.pt-br: Uma kouhai vai tentar todas as maneiras românticas e talvez eróticas para seduzir seu senpai.

altTitles.ja: 拳精
鉄拳チンミ

description.en:
In ancient China a young fighter named Chinmi goes to the Dairin temple for advanced training. He eventually must leave Dairin temple to go on a pilgrimage where he meets many challenges to test his skills.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Kung Fu Boy** (1991: tankoubon, 2011: bunko)

---

- **Won the 11th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 1987**

title.en: Kajiya de Hajimeru Isekai Slow Life

altTitles.ja: 鍛冶屋ではじめる異世界スローライフ

altTitles.en: My Quiet Blacksmith Life in Another World
Different World Slow Life Begun at the Smithy

altTitles.zh-hk: 成為鐵匠在異世界度過悠閒人生

altTitles.uk: Помірне життя ремісничого в іншому світі

altTitles.ru: Умеренная жизнь ремесленника в другом мире

description.en:
One night, Eizo, a hapless corporate slave, saves a cat and gets hit by a truck. The cat which seems to be related to a parallel world, in return for his help, grants Eizo a skill of his wish and reincarnates him to another world. Eizo, who has craftsmanship as a hobby and wishes to use this skill for a living, chooses to be reincarnated as a blacksmith. And so he starts his life in another world as a blacksmith just as he wishes. However, Eizo's creations are at another different level that will shake this new world.  
  
---

**Links:** 
- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/series/my-quiet-blacksmith-life-in-another-world)
description.fr: Une nuit, Eizo, un malheureux esclave d'entreprise, sauve un chat et se fait renverser par un camion. Le chat qui semble être lié à un monde parallèle, en échange de son aide, accorde à Eizo une compétence de son souhait et le réincarne dans un autre monde. Eizo, qui a l'artisanat comme passe-temps et souhaite utiliser cette compétence pour gagner sa vie, choisit de se réincarner en forgeron. Il commence donc sa vie dans un autre monde en tant que forgeron, comme il le souhaite. Cependant, les créations d'Eizo se situent à un autre niveau qui va bouleverser ce nouveau monde.
description.ja:
しがない社畜として生きていたエイゾウは、ある晩に猫を助けてトラックにはねられる。その猫は並行世界に関わる存在だったらしく、助けてくれた見返りとしてエイゾウに希望のスキルを与えたうえで異世界に転生させることを申し出る。エイゾウは趣味のモノ作りを生業としたいと思い、鍛冶屋として転生することを望む。その願いどおりに鍛冶屋として異世界でのモノ作りライフがはじまる。しかし、エイゾウのスキルは異世界を揺るがす業物を生み出すレベルだった――。

* **エイゾウ**
モノ作りと猫が大好きな元社畜。

* **サーミャ**
虎の獣人族の少女。エイゾウに命を助けてもらう。

---

- ![Syosetsu](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7266fe)
- [Official LN (JP)](https://kadokawabooks.jp/product/kajiyadehajimeruisekai)

altTitles.ja: 当て屋の椿

description.en:
Housen is an Edo period erotic painter, who stumbles into a murder mystery involving women who hooked up with one of his patrons. 
With the help of Tsubaki, a girl he runs into on the street who seems to know more about him than he does and is an artist herself, they start unraveling mysteries involving sex, murder, and occasionally the occult…
Two comic anthology volumes bundled with Vols 4 & 6 of the Blu-Ray Limited Edition release of the Plastic Memories anime.

altTitles.ja: ウチの神様はお布団

altTitles.vi: Thần Linh Nhà Tôi Là Cái Chăn Bông

description.en:
Taro, an office worker, has lived his life with a closed mind from others due to past trauma. 
One night, He finishes his work and goes straight home as usual. His room is simple with only the bare essentials. That's the moment when he took off his jacket to go to bed, he heard a strange voice echoing from behind...

``Welcome back, my lord.''

When he turned around in surprise, he saw a suspicious creature sitting up straight and bowing its head respectfully. (No, it's a living thing...? Or rather, could this be my futon?!) 

Will the "god" living in his favorite futon be able to heal Taro's hurt heart?
description.vi:
Taro, một nhân viên văn phòng, đã sống một cuộc đời khép kín với người khác do những tổn thương trong quá khứ. Một đêm nọ, anh làm xong công việc và đi thẳng về nhà như thường lệ. Căn phòng của anh rất đơn giản và chỉ có những đồ dùng thiết yếu. Đang lúc cởi áo khoác chuẩn bị đi ngủ thì anh bỗng nghe thấy một giọng nói lạ vang lên từ phía sau:
''Mừng ngài trở về, thưa chủ nhân''

Anh giật mình quay lại thì thấy một sinh vật khả nghi đang ngồi thẳng và cúi đầu kính cẩn chào mình. (Sinh vật gì đây? Không... Hình như đó là chăn của mình màaa?!) Liệu "vị thần" sống trong tấm chăn yêu thích của mình có thể chữa lành được trái tim tổn thương của Taro? Mọi người hãy cùng đón đọc:>

altTitles.ja: 領怪神犯

description.en:
A village where huge body parts fall from the sky.

A phenomenon where, after death, internal organs that should be inside the body completely vanish. People who continue to dream of immortality. Katagishi belongs to the Ryoukai Shinpan Special Investigation Division who deal with these unexplained phenomena that are beyond human knowledge. What is the real truth that he is pursuing...?

altTitles.en: The Reality of a Co-ed High School

altTitles.ja: 共学高校のゲンジツ

description.en: A comedic take on the daily lives of students in a co-ed high school.
description.ja:
チャンスなら転がっている！！ちょっとだけドキドキする……でも、進展しない！！盛り上がりそうで盛り上がらない毎日を悶々と過ごす男女の人間模様を描く、全く新しい草食系恋愛コメディー。

---

Chansunara korogatte iru!! Chotto dake dokidoki suru…… demo, shinten shinai!! Moriagari-sōde moriagaranai mainichi o monmon to sugosu danjo no ningen moyō o kaku, mattaku atarashī sōshoku-kei ren'ai komedī.

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.ja: LV999の村人

description.en: In this world, the concept of levels exist. Other than those who live off defeating monsters, most people are only around Level 1 to 5. What's more, not just anyone can go out to hunt monsters; it's heavily influenced by one's role appointed by God. There are eight such eligible roles: warriors, fighters, clerics, magicians, rogues, merchants, hunters, and sorcerers. Those blessed with extraordinary power are divided into three types: royalty, heroes, and sages. But for the majority of the population, they have no such powers and live by farming or running shops. Towns are developed by those with the weakest role: villagers. For the powerless villagers going out to hunt monsters is equivalent to committing suicide. But one day, a certain two-year-old child given the role of villager notices something: once you defeat a monster… you can earn great wealth.
description.pt-br:
Este aldeão… É invencível!! Em um mundo aonde seu papel é decidido no seu nascimento, o grupo mais fraco, os aldeões, servem apenas para desenvolver as cidades. Entre tais, existe Kagami, o homem que chegou ao incrível LV 999, conhecido como ‘O Aldeão Mais Forte’! Certo dia ele encontra Alice, uma garota demônio, que pede para ele ir contra o seu destino e se aventurar pelo mundo! Assim temos o início da história do ‘fraco aldeão’!


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel (Raw)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7612ct)

title.en: The Good Deeds of Old Adventurer Kane

altTitles.es: El buen obrar del señor Kane

altTitles.en: Good Deeds of Kane the Old Guy

altTitles.es: Las buenas obras del señor Kane

altTitles.ja: おっさん冒険者ケインの善行

altTitles.zh-hk: 大叔冒險者凱恩的善行

description.en:
A story about a kind man who deserves much better than what his little ambition has given him.   
  
Kane is a middle-aged and unambitious adventurer who, while in the middle of herb gathering, finds the rare item『Resurrection fruit』.  
  
Kane thinks about selling it and turn it into money, but he meets a girl seeking medicine to save her companion’s life. Since she looks like Altena, his late childhood friend, he gives it in exchange for small change.  
  
Actually, the girl is the strongest adventurer Anastrea, who people call The Sword Princess. The next day, Kane suddenly gets an invitation to join an S rank party, beats down the strongest and the worst monster, miraculously gains lots of money, and finally gets a confession by a 13 years old saint.  
  
Kane’s simple life will change completely because of his encounter with Anastrea.
description.es:
La historia de un hombre gentil que merece mucho más de lo que su poca ambición le ha otorgado.   
  
Kane, un aventurero de edad media, se encuentra en medio de una recolección de hierbas y da un objeto raro, [La Fruta de la Resurrección].   
  
Kane piensa en venderlo y convertirlo en dinero, pero conoce a una chica que busca medicina para salvar la vida de su compañera. Considerando que se parece a Altena, su difunta amiga de la infancia, se la otorga a cambio de un pequeño pago.   
  
En realidad, la chica es la aventurera más poderosa, Anastrea, denominada por la gente "La Princesa de la Espada".  
  
Al día siguiente, Kane de repente recibe una invitación para unirse a un grupo de rango S, vence al más fuerte y peor monstruo, milagrosamente gana mucho dinero y finalmente recibe la confesión de una santa.   
  
La vida simple de Kane cambiará completamente debido a su encuentro con Anastrea.

description.en: “Take the prettiest women, ride the fastest war horse, wield the strongest weapon, one rider blocking the GuanDong 18 roads*. One man standing against ten thousand, they bow to this hero of turbulent times. People say if Lu Bu doesn’t die, there will be no opportunity to cause chaos. I laugh at all the hypocrites in the world; there are no other heroes besides Feng Xian. Entering the life story of more than a thousand reincarnations, experiencing the many vicissitudes of life, tempered into steel. Can the current Lu Bu Feng Xian withstand the inevitable end at Bai Men Lou?”

**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

description.en: Super sweet and super-sand sculptured female statue against the harem! I often hear: "Three princes and three princesses! Your puppets are fighting again!" The overbearing female CEO traversed to the world of female honors and woke up with seven husbands.

In just one morning, my esper turned into an entirely different person. Cha Gweonwoo was an S level esper, one of only two in Korea. To Kim Doweon, Cha Gweonwoo was a blunt and cold esper that would call him to guide frequently. To Cha Gweonwoo, Kim Doweon was a guide who he saw as a walking IV. However, after Cha Gweonwoo was caught in an explosion, suddenly he became all smiles and happy to see Doweon!

altTitles.ja: アグネス仮面

description.en: Professional wrestler Yamamoto Shingo returned to Japan from a 5 year training trip in the US and Mexico, only to be greeted by his now defunct wrestling company: Yamato. He's come to find out that as soon as the president of the company passed away, the rival wrestling group Imperial Japan Pro Wrestling (IJPW) took down Yamato. Shingo is forced to seek revenge for Yamato by challenging the president of IJPW. One thing led to another, and now Shingo has been half-forced into working under IJPW as the new wrestler from Brazil: Agnes Mask.

description.fr:
"Eun Hae-il", est devenu adulte sans jamais oublier le garçon dont il était secrètement amoureux. Cette année-là, après avoir passé quatre fois le concours, il a finalement été accepté dans l'école de ses rêves. Mais alors qu'il sauvait un enfant tombé à la mer, il s'est épuisé et a été emporté par les vagues, au point de se noyer lui-même.

Alors qu'il fermait les yeux en pensant au garçon qu'il aimait tant juste avant de rendre son dernier souffle, lorsqu'il les rouvrit, il se trouvait dans un bus plutôt que dans l'océan.

Ressuscité après avoir traversé la mort et le temps, Eun Hae-il se retrouve face à son amour de jeunesse, "Yoon Pado". 

Est-ce que c'est vraiment une seconde chance offerte par le destin ?

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん
恋より青く

description.en:
Takamine, who can't find anything she likes, and Sakikura, who loves books. The two girls meet by chance and spend their after-school hours together. Are they friends? Or is it a nameless relationship spun between the two girls?

------------
Note: Serialization of the oneshot of same title by Fukaumi Kon in COMIC Ogyaaa!! published by Homesha.

**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

title.en: Choudokyuu Cheat Akuyaku Reijou no Karei naru Fukushuutan

altTitles.ja: 超弩級チート悪役令嬢の華麗なる復讐譚

altTitles.en: A Splendid Revenge Story of a Super-Dreadnought Cheat Villainess
A Splendid Revenge Story of a Super-Dreaded Cheat Villainess

description.en:
Lunaria il von Solfege. The protagonist, who was reincarnated as the villainess of her favourite game, was flooded with tragic memories of Lunaria. She was condemned, left alone and uncared for, and tried to commit suicide by stabbing herself with a dagger.
"Leave everything to me, Lunaria. Now that I'm Lunaria, I won't show them any mercy."
description.ja:
最愛の悪役令嬢・ルナリアに転生した主人公は、復讐を開始する。その相手とは、ルナリアを破滅へと追いやった、醜悪な面々。邪な義母と義妹、非道なる父や兄、そして元・婚約者と主人公（ヒロイン）‥！

目覚めたら、推しの悪役令嬢でした―――。
ルナリア・イル・フォン・ソルフェージュ。大好きだったゲームの悪役令嬢に転生した主人公の頭に流れ込んできたのは、ルナリアの悲惨な記憶。彼女は断罪され、誰からも気にされず一人ぼっちになり、そして自ら短剣を刺して自殺を図ろうとしたのだ。
「全部任せてルナリア。〝私〟がルナリアになったからには容赦なんかしてやらないわ。」
「愛」のために戦う悪役令嬢の、華麗なる復讐劇が開幕する―――。

description.en: Being an Elite Nanny is simple: protect the charge, obey the principle, and don’t get emotionally attached. Easier said than done when Davina’s first client is a dangerously compelling Venetian underboss who’s determined to get under her skin. What he wants from her, she can’t imagine, but Gabriel Angelini drags her back into the glittering world of organized crime she thought she’d left behind forever. She might get answers about her past if she digs deep enough, but can she protect Mikey from his father’s ambitions and keep her heart from getting tangled up in their treacherous web?

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレ日誌

description.en:
A series of different yandere images by the artist @RinRin200001.

---

**Links:**
- Retail Site - [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/maniax-touch/work/=/product_id/RJ420882.html) (Includes Chapter 1-50)

**Notes:**

title.en: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.ja: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w

altTitles.ja-ro: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.en: After Beating a Noob in an FPS, He Wanted to Fight Me in Real Life LOL

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Tôi Bón Hành Trong Game, Có Đứa Hẹn Kèo Đánh Tôi!

altTitles.id: Hasil dari Mengalahkan seorang Pemula di FPS yang Berkembang Menjadi Pertarungan di RL haha

altTitles.ro: Luptând Cu Un Începător La Jocurile FPS

description.en:
Decommisioned police officer Zhounan, is perplexed by a peculiar psychological experience. Upon contact with any object, he is able to perceive an individual's thoughts and envision what they experienced. Evidently he finds himself entangled within the city he is in - the numerous legends within the Lost City cities. And those seemingly absurd legends hide surprising secrets. A weird world slowly opens its doors to us…

---
**Notes:**
- This is not long strip.

title.en: Kimi wa Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi o!

altTitles.ja: 君は喧し閉じてよ口を！

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ha Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi wo!

altTitles.en: You're Too Noisy, So Just Shut It Already!
You Talk Too Much, So Just Shut It Already!

altTitles.vi: Cậu Ồn Ào Quá, Im lặng Giùm Tớ Đi!

altTitles.ru: Ты слишком много говоришь, так что заткнись уже!

altTitles.tl: Ang Ingay Mo Kaya Manahimik Ka Na Lang!

description.en: Hīragi Tsukino was born deaf. When she transfers to a new school, she meets a talkative boy named Enomoto Taiyō. Tsukino is slightly taken aback by Taiyō, who talks to her without regard to the fact that she can't hear.
description.ja: 柊月乃は生まれつき耳が聞こえない。そんな彼女が転校先で出会ったのは、おしゃべりな男子・榎本太陽。聞こえないことなんかお構いなしにしゃべりかけてくる太陽に若干引き気味な月乃。
description.ru: Хиираги Цукино родилась глухой. Когда она переводится в новую школу, она встречает говорливого мальчика по имени Эномото Тайо. Цукино немного обескуражена тем, что Тайо разговаривает с ней, не заботясь о том, что она не может его слышать...
description.vi: Hiiragi Tsukino là một cô bạn bị khiếm thính bẩm sinh. Khi cậu ấy chuyển đến trường mới, cậu ấy gặp được một cậu bạn lắm mồm tên Enomoto Taiyo. Tại đây, Tsukino luôn bị xoay tròn bởi những câu chuyện xàm xí của Taiyo bất chấp việc cô không thể nghe được cậu ta nói gì.

altTitles.ja: 謎の彼女Ｘ

description.en:
One day, a strange transfer student appears before Tsubaki. Urabe Mikoto is an antisocial girl, whose hobby is just sleeping during class-breaks. 
One day, Tsubaki goes to wake her up and accidentally tastes her drool… And gets hooked on that!  
  
After that, he starts going out with her and gets to know her better. Her second hobby, as it turns out, is carrying around scissors in her panties 
and cutting paper into flowers… or whatever else is getting on her nerves…

altTitles.ja: 酩酊の女傭兵ベル。

altTitles.vi: Belle cô lính đánh thuê say xỉn

altTitles.th: ทหารรับจ้างสาวขี้เมา เบล

description.en: A young traveller, when looking to take on a mercenary as protection against bandits, is forced to go with the cheapest: a young, cheerfully drunken warrior girl, who spends her income mostly on alcohol.

title.en: The Villainess Is Shy in Receiving Affection

altTitles.en: The Villainess Is Shy in Receiving Love
The Villainess Is Shy to Be Loved

altTitles.ja: 悪役なのに愛されすぎています

altTitles.th: สาวน้อยตัวร้ายชักรู้สึกเขินอายที่ได้รับความรัก

description.en:
My wicked mother brought a girl one day, the Duke's lost daughter, Loretta - the heroine of a novel called *The Duke's Four Children*. And I am Melody, the villainess in said novel who was punished alongside my mother for harassing the Duke's precious little girl. I didn’t want to die like that, so I decided to treat her well. I fed Loretta, put her to sleep, and played with her. And then her response was…?

"I hope Melody marries Loretta!"

Through her endless affection, I ended up coming back with her to the Duke's mansion, where she said "I'll stick close to Melody!"

Has there ever been anyone who is such a 'fool for Melody?!' Why am I being loved when I've only been kind to be able to live peacefully…!

---
When Melody discovers she's a villainess in someone else's story, being a slave dealer's daughter only adds to her guilty conscience. After her mother kidnaps Loretta, Duke Baldwin's long-lost child, Melody tries to comfort the scared little girl and forms a sisterly bond with her. So when the duke finds them, he takes both of them home because now they're inseparable! As the rest of House Baldwin becomes enamored with Melody's warm heart, will she ever learn that she deserves to be loved too?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD-%EC%86%8C%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EB%B0%9B%EA%B8%B0%EA%B0%80-%EB%B6%80%EB%81%84%EB%9F%AC%EC%9B%8C%EC%9A%94/3321), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61192421)
description.fr:
Ma méchante mère a amené une fille un jour.
C'était la fille cachée du duc, Loretta, l'héroïne des [Quatre enfants du duc].
Je suis Melody, la méchante qui a été punie par ma mère pour l'avoir harcelée.
Je ne veux pas mourir comme ça, alors je dois bien la traiter maintenant.
J'ai nourri Loretta, je l'ai endormie et j'ai joué avec elle.
Et puis sa réponse a été...
"J'espère que Melody épousera Loretta !"
Le déluge d'affection sans fin m'a conduit à la rejoindre auprès du duc et elle a dit : "Je vais rester près de Mlle Melody."
Avez-vous rencontré quelqu'un qui soit un "fou de Melody" plus qu'elle ?
Pourquoi suis-je aimée alors que j'ai seulement été assez gentille pour me faire vivre paisiblement.... !

title.en: Boku to Koi no Hanashi wo Shinaika

altTitles.en: Won't You Talk About Love With Me?

altTitles.ja: 僕と恋の話をしないか

description.en:
"Yana" is an infamous playboy who dumps people left and right. But his true identity is one with a pure heart pining for "Metsuki", the area's worst delinquent. He saved Yana at the entrance ceremony and the latter fell for him immediately! Yana never stops yapping about his love day in and day out for Metsuki, who's tired of all this crap. So he asked Yana if he could kiss him like they do in shoujo manga. And...?!

Emeichi's newest, love story between two clumsy high school boys starts here!!!

title.en: Please Lay Your Eyes on Jasmine

description.en: Jasmine had an accident with her one-sided love, Duke Aion. The straightforward man, who had not paid attention to her before, who had consistently ignored her, for some reason, now caught the feeling… “Don't you like me? Is that a lie? "Why would I lie about that?" “I know. You are that kind of person.” He was in a phase where he broke off from his cursed love, but instead it took a turn for the worse.

altTitles.zh-hk: 靈甲鬼修羅 - 避邪回歸

description.en: "On the beautiful Jeju Island, MiHo Won, a beautiful teacher, and Van, a cold and mysterious guy, become entangled in strange events, fighting unknown monsters. A legend of exorcism comics is back as webtoon!"

altTitles.fr: Dans un nouveau monde avec mon Smartphone

altTitles.th: ไปต่างโลก! ก็ต้องไปกับสมาร์ทโฟนสิ!!!

异世界和智能手机在一起

Xuyên Không Cùng Với Chiếc Smartphone

altTitles.zh-hk: 帶著智慧型手機闖蕩異世界。

altTitles.hi: मेरे स्मार्टफोन के साथ दूसरी दुनिया में

description.en: After a freak accident involving some lightning winds up zapping him dead, 15-year-old Mochizuki Touya wakes up to find himself face-to-face with God. "I am afraid to say that I have made a bit of a blunder" laments the old coot. But all is not lost! God says that he can reincarnate Touya into a world of fantasy, and as a bonus, he gets to bring his smartphone along with! So begins Touya's adventure in a new, anachronistic pseudo-medieval world. Friends! Laughs! Tears! Inexplicable Deus ex Machina! He sets off on a journey full of wonder as he absentmindedly travels from place to place, following whatever goal catches his fancy. The curtains lift on an epic tale of swords, sorcery, and smartphone apps!
description.vi:
Mochizuki Touya, 15 tuổi là main giống như bao anh main khác khi đang trên đường về nhà lại bị… sét đánh lăn đùng ra chết :v.Điều đáng nói ở đây là sau khi chết anh main lại bị triệu tập đến trước mặt Thượng đế với lý do: Ổng vô tình… hại chết anh main mà không hay biết. Và để đền bù thì ảnh đã được hồi sinh sang một thế giới song song khác với 1 cái Sì mát phôn (Smartphone :v).
Thừa hưởng trong mình một di sản to lớn về những nền văn minh cổ đại, anh thong dong đi trên con đường đơn độc tại một thế giới khác trong khi sở hữu một nguồn sức mạnh thậm chí có thể giúp anh làm bá chủ của cả thế giới thời bấy giờ.
Càng đi anh càng tạo thêm cho mình nhiều đồng chí quan trọng và trước khi kịp nhận ra… anh đã ngày càng lún sâu vào những bí mật được cất giấu tại thế giới đó…
description.pt-br: Touya Mochizuki foi acidentalmente morto e, como uma desculpa, Deus lhe permite renascer em um mundo de fantasia e lhe concederá qualquer coisa que ele desejar. E assim, Touya escolhe manter seu smartphone no próximo mundo. Em sua segunda chance na vida, ele faz amizade com muitas figuras importantes e se depara com o segredo do mundo. Ele herda o legado de uma civilização antiga e viaja despreocupadamente enquanto possui poderes que rivalizam com os reis daquele mundo.

title.en: The Devil Who Kisses My Feet

altTitles.en: The Demon Who Kisses My Foot

description.en: Maria, who is in an unhappy marriage with her sadistic husband, unexpectedly receives news. Her husband's half-brother, Lowell, was much younger than her husband. Maria, who had personally educated and raised him, learned that he had returned from the battlefield. Lowell, was not the small child or immature boy Maria remembered. He had the appearance of a grown man. With his appearance, a rift slowly began to appear in the seemingly peaceful Marquis Redford. Where would this relationship, which should never have begun, end?
description.pl: Kiedy młoda Maria zostaje wydana za mąż za Jacquesa Redforda, bogatego szlachcica, jest wdzięczna, że wydaje się on być łagodny i wyrozumiały. Jednak posiadłość Redfordów skrywa mroczne sekrety, a życie Marii zmienia się na gorsze, gdy na jaw wychodzą sadystyczne upodobania jej męża. Nie mając nikogo, na kim mogłaby się oprzeć, Maria znajduje pocieszenie w towarzystwie nieślubnego przyrodniego brata Jacquesa, Lowella. Teraz, gdy Lowell wrócił do domu jako bohater wojenny, czy może uratować Marię przed jej okrutnym losem?

altTitles.ja: やんちゃギャルの安城さん

description.en: Seto is a serious kid who leads a quiet High-school life, until he starts to get teased by resident Gal Anjo.

altTitles.ja: 攻撃力ゼロから始める剣聖譚
攻撃力ゼロのやわらか剣士～幼馴染の皇女に捨てられ魔法学園に留学したら、魔王を世話することになった～

altTitles.en: The Master Swordman’s Story Starts with the Zero Ability to Attack

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện của Kiếm sĩ vô năng trên con đường trở thành Thánh Kiếm

description.en: Although Eugene was blessed with an extraordinary talent for defensive magic, he had no talent for offensive magic. He is ridiculed as incompetent by those around him and enrolls in a magic academy to escape. However, his "useless" defensive magic came in handy there, and as expected, he was assigned to take care of the beautiful Demon King Erinyes, who once ruled the world...!?

title.en: Yuutousei wa Mi no Hodo Shirazu

altTitles.ja: 優等生は身のほど知らず

altTitles.en: The Honors Student Doesn't Know His Place

description.en:
Shougetsu, an honors student at the top of his grade, discovers the wonders of developing his backside. One day, a student from the same grade, Kyoujima, sees him anal masturbating in a classroom after school. In exchange for his silence, Kyoujima tells him to continue what he was doing...?!

A curiosity-filled high-schoolers' pleasure study love!!

title.en: Imokusa Reijou desu ga Akuyaku Reisoku wo Tasuketara Kiniiraremashita

altTitles.ja: 芋くさ令嬢ですが悪役令息を助けたら気に入られました

altTitles.en: I'm an Unfashionable Lady, but When I Helped a Villainous Young Lord He Ended up Liking Me
I'm an Uncouth Lady, but I Helped the Villainous Young Lord but He Ended up Liking Me

description.en:
Agnes, who was ridiculed in the social circles for being an unfashionable noble, happened to help Nazelbert, the duke's son, who had been betrothed to the Princess. However, the Princess saw this and ordered Nazelbert to marry Agnes as punishment. Isn't it terrible to marry me as a punishment? Look, he seems to hate it too. Wait, he doesn't?

This is a story about an unfashionable noble and a duke's son, who grow closer to each other.

---
* [Orignal Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2047go/)
description.ja: 伝統に執着する家柄のせいで古臭い格好を義務付けられ、「芋くさ令嬢」と馬鹿にされていたアニエス。あるパーティー中、王女殿下から婚約破棄された公爵の息子ナゼルを助けたことで、彼との結婚を命じられる！　しかし、命令で結婚したはずの二人は、本物の恋に落ちていき!?

description.en:
Siyeon, who returns home after studying abroad for college, finds out about the 'Understanding Wine' course that her younger sister has picked for her.  
It's very popular because it's about tasting wine, but Sihyeon is a lightweight that can't drink alcohol!  
When she decides to correct the course and attended it, she is reunited with her high school friend Eunha… !?

altTitles.ja: 異世界バトルロイヤル

description.en: A man in armor with the power of darkness, Ares the Dark Knight, was heading to the Demon King's Castle as a member of the Brave Party.  Hoping to defeat the Demon King and make a triumphant return to the hometown of Lulua, the hero's wise younger sister... And in the midst of the final battle, just as Ares delivers a dark blow... with signs of being taken somewhere, out of nowhere something takes you to another world.  It feels like you've been caught up in a battle royale, in which strong people from various worlds participate!?  To return to the original world with Lulua, who was separated, the dark knight Ares fights.  The story of trying to be the strongest in another world begins
description.pt-br: Um homem de armadura com o poder das trevas, Ares o Cavaleiro das trevas,estava indo para o Castelo do Rei Demônio como membro do Brave Party. Com a esperança de derrotar o Rei Demônio e fazer um retorno triunfante à cidade natal de Lulua, a sábia e irmã mais nova do herói… E no meio da batalha final, no momento em que Ares desfere um golpe sombrio… com sinais de estar sendo levado a algum lugar, do nada algo o leva para outro mundo. Parece que você foi pego em uma batalha real, na qual pessoas fortes de vários mundos participam!? Para voltar ao mundo original com Lulua, que foi separada, o cavaleiro das trevas Ares luta. A história de tentar ser o mais forte em outro mundo começa!

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.zh: 勇者们都想和魔王修炼

altTitles.en: The Brave Men All Want to Practice Asceticism With the Devil King

altTitles.zh-ro: Yongzhemen Dou Xiang He Mowang Xilian
Yǒngzhěmen Dōu Xiǎng Hé Mówáng Xiūliàn

altTitles.zh-hk: 勇者們都想和魔王修煉

description.en: The cold-blooded Demon King who has beaten all his enemies, who has always been second to none, ended up losing all his magical powers to a female hero who hexed him. What is this magical ritual that you do with the opposite sex’s lips? I can’t believe that even I, the formidable Demon King, have been defeated by this mysterious move! But no worries, I can retrain my abilities. It doesn't matter if you’re a succubus, an elf, a beast woman, or a noble hero’s descendant. I’ll use you as my training partner if I can help it. In order to revive the demon race, I’ll show you the Dual Cultivation Method!

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活

description.en:
A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)
description.es-la: Los colegas con diferentes personalidades tienen una vida privada donde uno se viste como una lolita y el otro se viste como una persona funky goath.

title.en: Remote Jugyou ni Nattara Class 1 no Bishoujo to Doukyo Suru Koto ni Natta

altTitles.en: When I got to remote class, I had to move in with the most beautiful girl in my class

altTitles.ja: リモート授業になったらクラス1の美少女と同居することになった

description.en:
High school student Kanata Yoshino who was at his wit's end, meets Haruka Hoshikawa, the most beautiful girl of his class, who was waving her smartphone alone in a park in the middle of the night.
He was asked by help from Hoshikawa who is bad with machines and doesn't know how to connect to the internet.
He ends up visiting her house, but little does he know, she has a secret purpose...!
The sweet and romantic cohabitation love comedy begins with the skilled invitation of the young lady!
